page.title: 08Waddingham Village(cont)
page.content: The old school which was built in 1830 is constructed of stone with a slate roof and has a wooden belfry where the school bell used to ring.Mr and Mrs Vaughan use to teach there. The two classrooms were separated by a partition and were heated by open fires. Another feature in the village is the church.The church is called St Mary and St Peter.The church which was built a long time ago,is used for marriages,funerals,baptisms,holy communion,and other services.Every Sunday there is a Sunday school taken by Mrs Smith of Waddingham. The grave yard has over a 100 graves.
